summary: Currently in beta. Adds dragon teeth, reinforced dragon bones, and reinforced steel plate armor. Adding all heavy armors. Allows dragon loot to be sold to blacksmiths.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]DragonLoot Overhaul
[size=4]Beta: [/size][/size]
Looking for testers(just download and comment below please.)
Looking for a designer to make models for dragon teeth and reinforced bone. I will give big credit for who ever does this.
Still a lot more work left. Still must add all reinforced armors, except steel plate.

[size=5]Update (8/10/2014)
[size=2]-Steel plate can be tempered
-[/size][/size][size=2]All heavy Armors have Reinforced versions.(Just in the game files, they can't be crafted yet.)
-Iron Banded armor can be crafted.[/size]

[size=5]Features:[/size]
[size=4]Adds:[/size]
-Dragon teeth (no use yet)
-Reinforced Dragon bones (made from four dragon bones with dragon smithing perk)
-Reinforced version of all (so far steel plate) heavy armors that make them a little better them a little better than daedric.
[size=2]-Dragon bones, teeth, and scales can be sold to blacksmiths[/size]

[size=5]Future:[/size]
I hope to make reinforced versions of all heavy armors, and to make reinforced heavy armor versions of all light armors. Use heart scales to make light reinforced versions. Use teeth for a super secret plan.
author: Jtrop
